SEARCH
Package objects

Class Cannon

java.lang.Object
objects.GameObject
objects.Cannon
public class Cannon extends GameObject
The Cannon class represents a cannon object in the game. It extends the GameObject class and provides specific functionality for cannons.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Cannon

      public Cannon(int x, int y, int objType)
      Constructs a new Cannon object with the specified coordinates and object type.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the cannon.
      y - The y-coordinate of the cannon.
      objType - The type of the cannon object.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the cannon object. This method is called during the game update loop.

      Gets the y-coordinate of the tile where the cannon is located.
